definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

sentences.english: who had been imprisoned in the Bastille for twenty years.
sentences.chinese: 这个贵族已在巴士底狱被关押了20年。

sentences.english: Thousands of people come to see the remains of the Bastille in Paris every year.
sentences.chinese: 每年有成千上万的游客参观巴黎的巴士底狱遗址。

sentences.english: The shadow of the Bastille had fallen on him again.
sentences.chinese: 巴士底狱的阴影又一次降临到了他身上。

definition: Cervantes/abbr. for 米格爾·德·塞萬提斯·薩維德拉|米格尔·德·塞万提斯·萨维德拉[Mi3 ge2 er3 · de2 · Sai1 wan4 ti2 si1 · Sa4 wei2 de2 la1]

pinyin: Na2 po4 lun2 · Bo1 na2 ba1

definition: Nyeva or Neva River (through St Petersburg)
